Title: American History X
Synopsis: A former neo Nazi tries to protect his brother from walking the same dark path.

Title: American Psycho
Synopsis: A Wall Street yuppie tries to hide his psychopathic bloodlust from his acquaintances.

Title: Batman Gotham Knight
Synopsis: Bruce Wayne transforms from tormented crime fighter to heroic icon of Gotham City.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Synopsis: A corrupt sheriff hires an African-American to drive away residents of a small town.

Title: Layer Cake
Synopsis: A drug dealer must rescue the daughter of a trade magnate while retrieving a drug loot.

Title: Memento
Synopsis: A man suffering from anterograde amnesia tries to find his wife's killer using notes and tattoos.

Title: Psycho
Synopsis: A woman disappears after stealing money from her employer.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
Synopsis: A retired widow gets addicted to medication intended for weight loss.

Title: Return of the Jedi
Synopsis: Luke Skywalker attempts to defeat Emperor Palpatine and redeem the Sith Lord Darth Vader.

Title: Shaun of the Dead
Synopsis: An aimless salesman and his friends are forced fight their way out of a zombie apocalypse.

Title: Star Wars
Synopsis: A young man sets off on a journey with a Jedi Knight to save the galaxy from the Galactic Empire.

Title: Superman
Synopsis: Clark Kent, the son of a Krypton scientist, fights for Truth, Justice and the American Way.

Title: The Empire Strikes Back
Synopsis: As Princess Leia fights the Empire, Luke Skywalker must master the Force and become a Jedi warrior.

Title: The Gentlemen
Synopsis: A cannabis mogul tries to sell his empire but stimulates an array of wrongdoings in the name of greed.

Title: The Last Samurai
Synopsis: A US army veteran in the 19th centure is hired by the Japanese emperor to train his army in modern warfare.

Title: Weird - The Al Yankovic Story
Synopsis: The unexaggerated, totally not fabricated true account (no, really) of the rise of Weird Al Yankovic
